page.title: 16LEISURE AND YOUTH ACTIVITIES
page.content: Various adult L.E.A. evening classes are held in the Secondary school and W.E.A. classes are held in the Red Hall.For ladies there is a W.I., a mothers Union and Abbey Wives. Situated in North Street are the Film Theatre,The Bingo Hall and the In Trim Health Gym. Keep-fit classes, a Badminton club,the Pyramid Snooker club and the new Snooker Hall are in Cherry Holt Road.Poole,Darts,Cribbage and Billiards have matches in the Public Houses.Bourne Players are the Amateur Dramatic Society and there is a Choral Society for those who enjoy singing. There are many clubs and activities for young people.They include Cubs,Scouts,Brownies,Guides,Ballet, Disco and Break Dancing.Hereward Youth Club and Youngbournes,Girls and Boys Brigades and Junior Football.
